Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Irrational  thoughts/fears can be big jerks. It’s a real challenge to redirect the brain onto more helpful and compassionate lines of thought. (For me it gets harder when hungry and/or tired, so a double whammy)   Sometimes it helps me to remind myself that sleep will actually improve my overall efficiency. I’ll have more energy, think more clearly, and actually do *more* because my brain and body have done the critical repair work that happens during sleep. Getting decent sleep is never a waste of time - it’s genuinely essential!

Author: SwampHag4589
Text: The first meal of the day is called “breakfast” because it breaks your nightly fast during sleep. Please let yourself sleep. Doesn’t matter if you’re sleeping or not, not eating is fasting. Don’t add sleep deprivation to your plate.
